title: Can I get scholarship in DLP of Akash class 10 on the basis of my ANTHE scholarship if I'll take my ANTHE examination in 2019? - Quora
tags: College and University Scholarship and Fellowships

response.answer_text: Yes definitely you will get scholarship on any course be it be DLP, class room or I tutor if you are meritorious or belong to a financially weak background even without ANTHE!!!! They just want brilliant students to study in their coaching so that they can attract more and more students by boasting their results. That is why they have made it compulsory for every student with an ANTHE rank under 150 to register themselves with their DLP course to be eligible for cash awards and this registration is not cancelled in any case. DLP course is free for these students. Obviously when these students crack any competitive exam no matter which ever coaching institute they are from, they claim their results under the banner”DLP student”. Now what you have to do? Visit any nearest corporate branch.Show them your academic records of schools or any other such valuable certificates.Tell them your ANTHE rank.Inform them about your financial status.If possible take any of your school teachers, usually school teachers and coaching teachers have good personal relations .They will definitely reduce their fee upto a minimum of 50%
